TopicTitle: Questions about a weird game glitch...

Articles.Content: I just bought the game and have only played it for 5 or so hours. Anyway, I finally got a ship out of the kerbin atmosphere and when i looked around to get a view of the planet, all I saw was a big black transparent sphere were kerbin should be. I could even see the stars through the planet so I know that it wasn't just the dark side. I also could not figure out how to get into the map view with the lines showing your orbit. Please help.

Have you tried restarting the game? Or you could reload the latest autosave by holding F9.

Welcome, by the way
M key is map screen. restarting game, flight, or quicksave-quickload should fix it.
